text: 11.28: Kis 12.21-30Moses guigira Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgi. Ana maaŋ muuŋgiap, Fhe Bakɨme fhura Isreriŋ garim, mbe nzerara kegi, ne ndɨkndɨgap, sipsiva shogiap, ana pi. Mbe mba sipsiva pav, Moses khaŋ mba Isreriŋ ga nzuai, nde mba sipsiva vɨzɨna ndiv wari wo pheni khɨzi gaagi hɨvgiri. Nde anan wari wo pheni khɨzi gaagi hɨvgirga, mba guma shogi vhɨzi enser Hevenan kegɨp zirɨp, tari baari shogɨrga, ana bigɨn thuen Isrerin tarir muuŋgirga fhu.
